description: Every string of 2 consecutive base 7 digits contains exactly 2 distinct numbers.
crossrefs: Cf. A000975 (base-2 analog), A031941 or A043089 (base-3 analog), A031942 or A043090 (base-4 analog), A031943 or A043091 (base-5 analog), A043092, ...,  A043096 (base-6 through base-10 analog).
author: _Clark Kimberling_
